unittitle_ssm: Solomon C. Frucht Brooklyn Navy Yard ephemera
abstract_ssm: Contains ephemera which belonged to Solomon C. Frucht while he was employed by the U.S. Navy at the Brooklyn Navy Yard from 1934 to 1963. The ephemera includes invitations, receipts, and material related to civil service retirement benefits.
subject_ssm: Navy-yards and naval stations |z New York (State) |z Kings County
collection_ssm: Solomon C. Frucht Brooklyn Navy Yard ephemera
